message: I propose a fair and generous split. Take 10% and we're done.

Alice, your offer was quite bold! Let's be reasonable. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. Consider that time is money - literally! -  and this deal will save us both from further losses due to inflation.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. We've both lost money due to inflation, so let's find a solution that's better for both of us.
